title: Extra mouse buttons not working after Star Guardian update.
body:
So, during this current patch, my MB4 and MB5 were working. But after you released invasion mode etc. , somehow they aren't working anymore. So i thought, maybe it's a hardware problem. So i went on overwatch to test it and use MB4 as i usually do for melee hit and it worked, so it's not a hardware problem.
I tested also on LoL client and went to the key-bindings menu outside of game and i could smoothly bind MB4 and MB5 to item slots with no problem, but as soon as i get in game, those buttons do not work and i can't bind them from the in-game settings.

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10 and was it recently updated around this time?  The update has been giving some players issues binding those keys, and our current solution has been to rollback the update.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well in case our tech team can find some additional options specific to you.
Ok it seems that after yesterday's patch it got fixed. Thank you anyways!!

Yeah i'm on windows 10. I'll try to rollback the update. Just for info, will you put a fix on any future patch or hotfix or i must really rollback the update?
Thank you a lot!
